faq.question: What features does EduBreezy offer?
faq.answer: EduBreezy offers 20+ modules including admissions, student management, fee collection, attendance tracking, exam management, report cards, timetable, homework, transport with GPS tracking, library, inventory, payroll, digital certificates, parent mobile app, school explorer platform, and AI-powered analytics. All features work together seamlessly.

faq.question: Is EduBreezy suitable for CBSE / ICSE schools?
faq.answer: Yes! EduBreezy is fully compatible with CBSE, ICSE, State Boards, IB, IGCSE, and Cambridge curriculums. Our system adapts to your board's requirements for report cards, grading patterns, and academic structures.

faq.question: How does AI help school administrators?
faq.answer: Our AI provides intelligent insights on attendance patterns, fee collection trends, and student performance. It generates automated daily briefings, predicts potential issues, and helps administrators make data-driven decisions without manual analysis.

faq.question: Is student data secure in EduBreezy?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We use 256-bit AES encryption, role-based access control, daily automated backups, and are compliant with Indian data protection guidelines. Your data is hosted on secure cloud infrastructure with 99.9% uptime.

faq.question: How does fee management work?
faq.answer: Our fee module handles the complete lifecycle - fee structure creation, class-wise and student-wise assignment, automated invoicing, multiple payment modes (online, UPI, cash, cheque), installment plans, late fee calculation, instant digital receipts, due reminders via SMS, and detailed collection reports.

faq.question: Can parents pay online?
faq.answer: Yes, absolutely! Parents can safely pay fees online using our secure payment gateway which supports Credit Cards, Debit Cards, Net Banking, and UPI. They receive instant digital receipts, and the school's accounts are automatically updated.

faq.question: Does EduBreezy support exams and results?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide complete exam management - schedule creation, subject configuration, hall ticket generation, seat allocation, marks entry with validation, grade calculation, automated report cards, online exams support, and performance analytics with subject-wise and class-wise analysis.

faq.question: How does transport management work?
faq.answer: Our transport module covers vehicle registration, route planning with stops, student-to-route and stop assignment, real-time GPS tracking, driver mobile app, bus trip logging, bus attendance, transport fee management, and parent visibility of bus location.

faq.question: What about attendance tracking?
faq.answer: Our smart attendance system supports student and staff tracking with status options (Present, Absent, Late, Half-day), geo-fencing, auto-absent marking, bulk entry, leave management, instant SMS notifications to parents, and comprehensive attendance reports and statistics.

faq.question: Can I generate certificates and ID cards?
faq.answer: Yes! Generate transfer certificates, bonafide certificates, character certificates, and custom documents with your school's letterhead, digital signatures, and stamps. We also support ID card and admit card generation with QR verification.

faq.question: Is there a mobile app for parents?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide native iOS and Android apps for parents to view attendance, pay fees, check exam results, view homework, read notices, track transport, and communicate with teachers - all in real-time with push notifications.

faq.question: How easy is onboarding?
faq.answer: Very easy! Our dedicated team handles complete setup in 1-2 weeks. We provide data migration from your existing system via Excel import, free training for all staff, and ongoing support to ensure smooth adoption.

faq.question: What user roles are supported?
faq.answer: EduBreezy supports multiple roles: Super Admin, Admin, Principal, Director, Teaching Staff, Non-Teaching Staff, Accountant, Librarian, Transport Staff, Parent, and Student - each with appropriate access levels and permissions.

faq.question: Can I request a demo?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer personalized demos tailored to your school's needs. Contact us through our website or call our sales team to schedule a free demo session where we can show you all features relevant to your school.
